timeline.message:
Fix bug in ChannelDTOMapper

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>
(cherry picked from commit 9463958c8c39b70aa8b9aaaab7550748fa38ddef)

Added unit tests for ChannelDTO and ThingDTO / BridgeDTO

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
(cherry picked from commit 017a2fcb66b4c109e800a6191da727e336a31663)

Add AutoUpdatePolicy to ChannelDTO

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>

Make AutoUpdatePolicy a String in ChannelDTO

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>

Fill in a default AutoUpdatePolicy

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>

Use null for AutoUpdatePolicy instead of default value

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>

timeline.author: cweitkamp

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove the full stop at the end of JavaDoc params or return values

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return the parsed AutoUpdatePolicy.
          
          
            
                 * @return the parsed AutoUpdatePolicy
timeline.author: cweitkamp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,5 +36,26 @@
      * An automatic state update should be sent by the framework because no updates will be sent by the binding.
      * This usually is the case when devices don't expose their current state to the handler.
      */
-    RECOMMEND,
+    RECOMMEND;
+
+    /**
+     * Parses the input string into a {@link AutoUpdatePolicy}.
+     *
+     * @param input the input string
+     * @return the parsed AutoUpdatePolicy.
